subject: The Skinny: Thursday May 3, 2007
body:

What Motivates Fred Thompson? 
What's actor/politician Fred Thompson's motivation to take on the real-life role of president of 
      the United States? Barack Obama delivers some "tough love" on the campaign 
      trail. And what's Congress' next move in 
      the Iraq war debate?
Joel Roberts has the highlights of the day's headlines.  More...



Joel Robertstheskinny@cbs.com
